column4: I'm having problems with the mythmusic plugin on ubuntu, Whenever I select the Scan for new music item, nothing happens, is there any other way to add music to the playlist, or any ideas on why it might not work? has anyone had it work?
did it work out of the box?
no you have to setup a music directory
any idea on where that is documented?
just install drupal and the paypal module and you'll find out like I did,            The paypal people called my dns server people and they shut me down becuase of a phishing scam
